Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Ummaan camiliy sinam qaybisaah ilqah Fingaa kee baati tan
Diggah usuk isi maali isi waarisu waam yakkale addunyal
Caagid usuk elle yakkale inna hinna! Diggah usuk cutama degqsitta giray edde qambisinnaanihim bokookissát gasyime le
nabiyow Maca koo tiysixxigeeh cutamá kinnim
Is Yallih giray ursumteeh hadiidigsinte kinni
Is leh tan niqnah gibdah xagarak sorkocobbaxittel bukku itta
Diggah is keenil alfimteh kaluqqu itte
Usun makaadooday ruubumut tanih addat axawat anuk. (teetik awqe waanâ gidah)
